name: tubbies
description: This is a BrickHack3 Project in collaboration with @MIngjianZhang, a web application based on Youtube APIs for realtime commenting and streaming youtube videos. We used technologies such as PHP, MySQL and HTML/CSS/Javascript(jQuery).  ### Details This project is still in beta stage, stuck in AWS deployment because of database issues, will try to deploy in Heroku again.  To view a demo, please visit [Devpost] (https://devpost.com/software/danmu-project-instant-commenting-on-youtube) for details.
